ygData.subject: Re: Re: Really cool corpse locating tip
ygData.msgSnippet: If you have your mouse control enabled, then you can hold down the right mouse button to move the view. ... From: Rob Noble  To
ygData.messageBody:
If you have your mouse control enabled, then you can hold down the right mouse button to move the view.

>>> Rob Noble<rnoble001@...> 02/26/00 01:41PM >>>
From: Rob Noble <rnoble001@...>

To change camera angle you just hold down <alt> while hitting the arrow
keys... More exact (Let me grab my manual right here....)

P. 73
CAMERA CONTROLS
----------------------------
F9 - Camera Toggle
F10 - Full/Partial screen toggle
F11 - Toggle Lag Meter
F12 - Toggle Mouse Look
Numberpad 9 - Pitch up
Numberpad 3 - Pitch Down
Numberpad 7 - Zoom in
Numberpad 1 - Zoom out
Home Key - Center View
Right Alt Key + Movement keys - Pan Camera

Alternate Camera Controls
Page up - Pitch up
Page down - Pitch down
Insert - Zoom in
Delete - Zoom out
---------------------------

Well, I hope that helps.

--Banyon, Wandering Minstral of Bertoxx


"Daniel P. Sniderman" wrote:

> From: "Daniel P. Sniderman" <fuzzbone@...>
>
> Pardon me for losing my manual - but how do you rotate the camera in
> external view? I couldn't figure that out last night.
>
> BTW - it's pretty cool watching your corpse being dragged with the
> song..
>
> Slyde
